crate asciinema video

Setup asciinema

  1. install asciinema:

     sudo apt-get install asciinema

  2. start recording:

     asciinema rec

  3. run commands that will be recorded:

    For exmaple:

     /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/arcionlabs/docker-dev/HEAD/install.sh)"

  4. stop and upload:

  • stop asciinema rec

      exit

  • press <enter> to upload to https://asciinema.org/

At asciinema.org

  1. link accounts if not already done

  2. change title to “Source To Destination Replication Workloads” For exmaple 
     MySQL to PostgresSQL Full TPCC,YCSB
  3. change idle timing to .5 sec

asciinema to gif

https://github.com/asciinema/agg

sudo apt-get install cargo cargo install –git https://github.com/asciinema/agg

create terminalizer gif

sudo apt install npm
sudo npm install -g terminalizer
terminalizer record demo
